segments.text: Hey , May . How about getting together for a movie tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Let me check the newspaper . What about The Terminal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , it stars Catherine Zeta-Jones , my favorite actress .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , birds of a feather flock together . I like her too . She was in a lot of dramas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is so beautiful and elegant . And she is famous for her fine acting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's more , she doesn't have scandals . And she likes to take part in the charitable activities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , a legend , also . I still remember , his movies , Jurassic Park and Schindler's List got him nine Oscar awards in 1994 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you introduce the story of The Terminal briefly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It tells a romantic and humorous love story .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is really exciting movie . Lets go to this one .
segments.speaker: S1
